page.title: 12THOMAS WATKINS OF DEFYNNOG
page.content: I woke up at 7.30 am. I had 'Start' for breakfast. At 8.40 am. I went to school. I get my pencil case out first and put my hymn book in the hall. At 9.15am the whistle went for assembly, today it was so boring I nearly fell asleep. After English, topic maths, maths, tables, etc.etc. it was time for play. We had half an hour to eat our dinner and half an hour to play, usually football, touch or cricket. After play we did the Domesday Project ..finding things out about Defynnog. The bell rang for last play but we went to change ready for swimming. In swimming we practised breathing. In the free swim at the end of the lesson I played with James. At 3.25 I went home and watched T.V. I had tea then watched T.V. again before going to bed at 8.00 and reading for an hour before going to sleep at 9.00.(27/6/85)
